name: 4: Luxurious Weariness
description:
"'There is not a door in the whole house, lest some hinge should creak, nor is there any watchman at the threshold. In the midst of the cavern stands a lofty couch of ebon wood, dark in colour, covered with black draperies, feather soft, where [she] lies, [her] limbs relaxed in luxurious weariness. Around [her] lie empty dreams, made to resemble different shapes, (...)'" »Derek Jarman: Chroma

:: Shadow Room series 
:: laser prints, paper & digital collage 
:: the primary collector can claim a single edition 20x20cm Fine Art Print on Hahnemühle Photo Rag paper
:: on primary this OBJKT also includes Shadow Room 1&5
:: @annaxmalina :: annamalina.com
